column5: Great location for attending the Superbowl in Houston. Property is located in a gated neighborhood within The Woodlands, Texas. Grocery store, numerous restaurants and other amenities are near the property. Additionally, there is freeway access to two major freeways leading to Houston. We have multiple beds in the house (2 Queen, 2 Twin Mattresses, 1 Toddler and 1 King Mattress).
column8: Superbowl Destination Great Home Away From Home
